Method Detail

getNoise

public static double getNoise(double s)
Gets a noise value sampled from the standard ACT-R noise distribution. The normal approximation used here is derived from the canonical ACT-R code.

Parameters:
s - the s value of the normal distribution
Returns:
a value sampled from this distribution
